trans-unit.source: Displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: 可自訂的格線中顯示資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 新的儲存格變成目前儲存格時，通知可存取的用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload twice using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將轉換成指定的資料列和資料行索引`objectID`和`childID`參數，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載兩次使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1.
trans-unit.target: `objectID`和`childID`取決於其顯示的順序，如果兩者可見的且從 1 開始計算的資料列或資料行的標頭中編號只有可見資料列和資料行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料行行首為可見，`objectID`第一個可見的非標題資料列是 2。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the row and column indexes of the new current cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>指出新的目前儲存格的資料列和資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1. -or- The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 值<> *> 屬性 cellAddress 小於 0 或大於此數目減 1 控制項中的資料行數目。 -的值<> *> 屬性 cellAddress 小於 0 或大於此數目減 1 控制項中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> for a column header cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that is currently being painted.
trans-unit.target: 調整<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>的欄標頭資料格的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>目前正在繪製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項在內部呼叫 AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle 方法，以判斷資料行標題儲存格的框線外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項通常會使用值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that that represents the column header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，表示資料行標頭框線樣式，來修改。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the column header border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>用來儲存中繼資料行標頭框線樣式變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>也就是顯示在第一個資料行中目前所繪製為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the last column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>也就是最後一個資料行中目前所繪製為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style for the current column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，代表目前的資料行標頭框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style for the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得在左上方儲存格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left cell is the cell that is shared by the column header row and the row header column.
trans-unit.target: 左上方儲存格是共用的資料行的標頭資料列和資料列的標頭資料行的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> gets the value of this property while painting the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>取得這個屬性的值時繪製左上角儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the border of the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中的左上方儲存格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得中的資料格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedCellBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: AdvancedCellBorderStyle 屬性可以用於自訂的儲存格框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更使用內建樣式框線的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中的資料格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the column header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料行的框線樣式中的標頭資料格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of column header cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle 屬性來自訂資料行首儲存格的框線的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更使用內建樣式框線的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the row header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列的框線樣式中的標頭資料格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of row header cells' borders in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle 屬性來自訂中衍生的資料列標題儲存格的框線外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更使用內建樣式框線的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否對使用者顯示加入資料列的選項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to add rows if both this property and the data source's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>繫結至資料，允許使用者新增資料列，如果這個屬性與資料來源的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性都設為`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the add-row option is displayed to the user; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果加入資料列選項會顯示給使用者。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to delete rows from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許使用者刪除資料列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to delete rows if both this property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>繫結至資料，允許使用者刪除資料列，如果兩個此屬性和<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性都設為`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以刪除資料列。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用手動的資料行重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position.
trans-unit.target: 啟用資料行重新調整位置時，使用者可以將資料行標頭拖曳到新位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，已凍結和解除凍結的資料行形成兩個不同的群組。使用者可以重新定位在群組中，資料行，但無法將資料行從一個群組移到另。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不支援雙重緩衝。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>設`true`中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會收到的視覺化回饋。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can change the column order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以變更資料行順序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以調整資料行的大小。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來防止使用者以手動方式變更資料行寬度。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，例如，具有僅顯示資料行位置一次載入資料，以及資料行在該時間會調整的大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不支援雙重緩衝。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>設`true`中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會收到的視覺化回饋。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至奇數資料列的預設儲存格樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其儲存格，使用以資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，後者繼承自其他屬性的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>樣式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的樣式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 奇數索引的資料列中的資料格，透過 AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle 屬性所指定的樣式會覆寫透過指定樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>，並透過指定的樣式會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 您應該盡可能使用單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>設定此屬性的多個資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>来套用至奇數資料列。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cells are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否所有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>目前選取的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection does not perform efficiently with large selections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合不會執行有效率地使用大型的選項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> have been selected before you access the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection, check the return value of the AreAllCellsSelected method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否所有儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>存取內容之前已選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合，檢查 AreAllCellsSelected 方法的傳回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, this method can cause rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個方法可能會導致變成非共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>效能，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the rows and columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*> property values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要包含的資料列和資料行與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>屬性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all cells (or all visible cells) are selected or if there are no cells (or no visible cells); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已選取所有資料格 （或所有可見儲存格），或者如果有任何資料格 （或沒有可見儲存格）。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否會自動建立資料行時<> *> 或<> *> 設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are set or changed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為時，自動產生資料行`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>設定或變更屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Columns can also be automatically generated when the AutoGenerateColumns property is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 資料行也可能會自動產生從 AutoGenerateColumns 屬性變更時`false`至`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>變更，使不符合先前的資料行的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>不相符的資料行中資料的值會被捨棄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性就會忽略<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>未設定的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When AutoGenerateColumns is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateColumns 設`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項資料來源中產生之物件的每個公用屬性的一個資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the bound objects implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結的物件實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>控制項產生一個資料行所傳回的每一個屬性的介面，<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料行標頭將包含資料行代表屬性名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property but set AutoGenerateColumns to `false`, you must add columns manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性但設 AutoGenerateColumns `false`，您必須手動加入資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定每個加入的資料行繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的繫結的物件所公開的屬性名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the AutoGenerateColumns property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>在 Windows Form 設計工具會自動將 AutoGenerateColumns 屬性設定為`false`並產生程式碼加入，將繫結資料來源中的每一個屬性的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段產生的程式碼相當於下列範例所示手動加入的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它不是在執行階段 AutoGenerateColumns 屬性設定為時所發生的資料行自動產生相同`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該自動; 建立資料行否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: AutoGenerateColumnsChanged 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 調整寬度，以適合其所有儲存格，包括標題儲存格內容的指定資料行。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性或資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 調整寬度，使用指定的大小模式的指定資料行。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性或資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode has the value and is .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModehas the value and is .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode has the value , , or .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModehas the value , , or .

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnMode不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整寬度，使用指定的調整模式，選擇性地計算預期接下來將調整資料列的高度與寬度的指定資料行。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性或資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，將計算資料行寬度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的寬度，根據目前的資料列高度。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算時會也將調整資料列高度的寬度。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode has the value and is .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModehas the value and is .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode has the value , , or .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModehas the value , , or .

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnMode不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the contents of the largest column header.
trans-unit.target: 調整以符合最大資料行行首的內容資料行行首的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 調整指定資料行中的標頭的內容變更資料行首的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制時，只指定資料行中的標頭的內容已變更使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源，重新調整大小資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: 包含已變更內容的行首的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整資料行標頭，以適合其內容，選擇性地計算預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列的標頭寬度與高度的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數`false`，資料行首的高度會計算您將這類呼叫方法時會<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的資料列標頭; 寬度<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算時會也將調整資料列行首寬度的高度。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new height based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的資料行寬度。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算資料行寬度也將調整時會高度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整根據指定的資料行，並選擇性地計算高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列的標頭寬度的情況中的標頭的內容變更的資料行首的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制時，只指定資料行中的標頭的內容已變更使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源，重新調整大小資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數`false`，資料行首的高度會計算您將這類呼叫方法時會<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column header whose contents should be used to determine new height.
trans-unit.target: 其內容應該用來判斷新的高度資料行標頭的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的資料列標頭; 寬度<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算時會也將調整資料列行首寬度的高度。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the specified column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的寬度所指定的資料行;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算資料行寬度也將調整時會高度。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: 調整所有資料行，以適合其所有儲存格，包括標題儲存格內容的寬度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 會一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性或資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 調整使用指定的大小模式的所有資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，將計算資料行寬度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 調整寬度，在資料列標頭，根據指定的資料列中的標頭的內容變更，並使用指定的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整寬度，使用指定的調整模式，選擇性地計算寬度，並在預期接下來將調整資料列和/或資料行首寬度的情況，在資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`參數`false`，將計算資料列標頭的寬度，但卻會這類呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>多載。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載已受到保護，而且是可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的資料行寬度。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算資料行寬度也將調整時會的高度。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeRowsMode has the value or , and is .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsModehas the value or , and is .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeRowsMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsMode不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: autoSizeRowsMode has the value .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsMode具有值 。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of the specified rows using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the heights with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整指定使用指定的調整模式，選擇性地計算預期接下來將調整資料行寬度與高度的資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是如果您想要控制資料列的大小，但您想要調整大小只有特定資料列的子集，例如已更新的繫結記錄的範圍內時很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料列高度，以指定的資料列會一次調整每個方法呼叫。如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use a different overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用不同的多載的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例衍生的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小的第一個資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to resize.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要計算新的高度根據目前的資料行寬度。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>計算資料行寬度也將調整時會的高度。

trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsMode不是有效值。

trans-unit.target: rowIndexStart小於 0。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。
