trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>屬性資料行變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如何判斷資料行寬度。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以便填滿控制項，或調整儲存格的內容，自動調整資料行寬度。

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 每當變更控制項的寬度調整大小就會發生在填滿模式。

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: 在以內容為基礎的調整大小模式調整大小發生或儲存格內容變更時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>啟用時，每當資料列高度變更時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些以內容為基礎的調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更個別資料行的調整模式，將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>，指出資料行繼承它的行為及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>從控制項的屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 中的填滿模式資料行分割中所指定的比例的可用控制項寬度其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 適用於填滿模式寬度取決於減去從用戶端區域控制項的寬度的所有資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此寬度小於結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>所有填滿模式資料行的值，會顯示水平捲軸、 最小寬度，以顯示所有填滿模式資料行和使用者資料行調整已停用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資料行填入模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有包含資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更的資料行可見性不會進行調整。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當資料行自動調整設定，使用者將無法調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行寬度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法或一組資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> and at least one visible column with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>、 隱藏的資料行標頭，以及至少一個可見資料行具有<> *> 屬性值為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref>。 -指定的值設定這個屬性時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>和至少一個可見的資料行與<> *> 屬性值為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>已凍結。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如何判斷資料列高度。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以適合其內容，每當內容變更時，會自動調整資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>已啟用，資料列高度也將進行調整資料行寬度變更時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有當資料列與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更資料列的可見性不會進行調整。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當自動調整設定的資料列時，使用者將無法調整資料列高度，以滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>自動調整大小的資料列的值會重新計算期間配置來說明所用的字型的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, you should retrieve the value in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得正確<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>，您應該擷取表單中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是表單的建構函式中的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust row heights programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods, or set the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列高度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法或一組資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref>值，指出調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Puts the current cell in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前的儲存格置於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`儲存格無法進入編輯模式，這可能會針對多種原因所造成。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`如果目前儲存格為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它也會傳回`false`如果儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>屬性是`null`（這表示儲存格無法裝載編輯控制項），但資料格類型未實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell supports editing, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit> event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格支援編輯，此方法就會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>事件，可以取消，並傳回`false`如果事件處理常式取消編輯</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>

trans-unit.source: If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消編輯，而且資料格可以裝載編輯控制項，這個方法會初始化的控制項，並顯示。

trans-unit.source: If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化失敗，則這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格成功進入編輯模式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select all the cell's contents; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to not select any contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要選取所有儲存格的內容。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示不選取任何內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的儲存格已經處於編輯模式，或成功進入編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> is not set to a valid cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>未設定為有效的儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called in a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: -或-的處理常式中呼叫此方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not derive from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> type. -or- The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格所表示的型別<> *> 屬性不是衍生自<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>型別。 -儲存格所表示的型別的<> *> 屬性未實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 編輯儲存格值的初始設定失敗，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the CellBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果以外 CellBorderStyle 屬性設定為任何項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已透過使用的自訂儲存格框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref>表示中所包含的資料格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的框線樣式變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時，包含框線和邊框間距。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key.
trans-unit.target: 也會在使用者按下並釋放的空間索引鍵時按鈕儲存格或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，如果按下空格鍵，按一下資料格就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型。

trans-unit.source: To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷按下儲存格內容時，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: This event does not receive information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件不會接收滑鼠位置的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式需要的滑鼠位置的相關資訊，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下儲存格內的內容。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按下儲存格內容時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下並放開按鈕儲存格時空格鍵，或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，以及如果按下空格鍵，按一下儲存格內容，就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型時，它也會發生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to detect button clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> or link clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件偵測 按鈕按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>或點選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>連結</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要儲存格的捷徑功能表時。

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件只發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件時，您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示使用者只要按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於目前的狀態或儲存格的值，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: CellContextMenuStripNeeded 也會發生此事件時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別儲存格的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性或處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定會覆寫的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定和 CellContextMenuStripNeeded 事件覆寫兩者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以指定`null`的儲存格的捷徑功能表，以防止遭到覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.target: 就會發生的編輯模式停止目前所選取的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current cell changes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or when the control receives input focus.
trans-unit.target: 中的目前儲存格變更時，就會發生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項，或當控制項收到輸入的焦點。

trans-unit.source: This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項不具有輸入的焦點且按下儲存格之前不是目前儲存格，此事件可能會發生兩次的按一下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*> property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>的儲存格變更的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要儲存格的錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellErrorTextNeeded 事件只發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the CellErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: 處理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件時，您想要判斷其值或狀態資料格的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件處理常式中指定錯誤文字時，錯誤圖像便會出現在資料格中，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: CellErrorTextNeeded 事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理 CellErrorTextNeeded 事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>多個資料格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要顯示格式化儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將會嘗試將儲存格的值轉換成適合顯示的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它會將數值轉換成文字 方塊儲存格中顯示字串。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定要使用的設定的格式設定慣例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>這類屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the CellFormattingevent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有足夠的標準格式，您可以自訂處理 CellFormattingevent 格式。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您指出精確顯示值，以及儲存格樣式，例如背景和前景色彩，用於儲存格顯示。

trans-unit.source: This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您可以處理這個事件的任何一種格式，不管儲存格的值本身是否需要格式化的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The CellFormatting event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: CellFormatting 事件發生在每一次，每個儲存格繪製，因此您應該避免的漫長處理在處理這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 也會發生此事件時的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>擷取或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellFormatting event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理的 CellFormatting 事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要轉換的值，以確保新值的儲存格所指定型別的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出格式化任何其他值是必要，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式完成時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`或不正確的型別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>使用格式化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性所傳回的儲存格樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，使用儲存格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 值為何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，所傳回的物件的顯示屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性用來呈現資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the CellFormatting event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用 CellFormatting 事件的自訂格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中自訂格式化資料](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免效能的負面影響，在處理此事件時，存取參數傳遞的事件處理常式，而不是直接存取儲存格的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂格式化的使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格失去輸入的焦點且不再是目前的資料格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下使用滑鼠在儲存格上的任何地方。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 使用任何滑鼠按鈕，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測點選的資料格，例如按鈕或連結資料格中，內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會接收的資料行索引和資料列的滑鼠指標位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格內<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>按兩下時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按兩下使用任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標在儲存格界限內時，使用者按下滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user presses any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標進入儲存格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標離開儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標移到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while over a cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者放開滑鼠按鈕的儲存格上方。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user releases any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者放開任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要繪製儲存格。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理此事件，以自訂控制項中的儲存格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繪製整個儲存格，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料格的特定部分，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來繪製其他部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 當處理此事件，您應該透過事件處理常式的參數，而不是直接存取儲存格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格離開編輯模式，如果已修改資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將會嘗試將使用者指定的值，顯示在資料格來實際基礎資料格的值之資料格所指定的型別轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這項轉換會使用傳回的資料格的儲存格樣式的格式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the CellParsing event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: 如果標準轉換不符合您的需求，處理 CellParsing 事件以提供自訂的值轉換為要求的類型。

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以進入編輯模式，使用指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>屬性，並且可以保留編輯模式中，資料格，以認可所有變更，將移到另一個資料格，或按下 ENTER 鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the CellParsing event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 按下 esc 鍵將會還原為值的任何變更後再認可，而且不會發生 CellParsing 事件。

trans-unit.source: The CellParsing event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: CellParsing 事件才會發生實際已修改資料格的值，即使最後的值時的原始值相同。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 它也會發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellParsing event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 CellParsing 事件時，您可以自行轉換值，或您可以自訂預設轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以將值轉換自己使用資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析值，但修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，使用儲存格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您自行轉換值時，取代初始，其格式的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性之資料格所指定的型別轉換的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出不再剖析是必要，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式完成時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`或不正確的型別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>使用資料格會剖析<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>方法使用預設類型轉換器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>傳入的儲存格樣式屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>、 值剖析使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性和傳入的類型轉換器</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換為格式化的值來顯示，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格狀態變更，例如儲存格失去或獲得焦點時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個儲存格樣式的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The CellStyleContentChanged event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the CellStyleContentChanged event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值時，就會發生 CellStyleContentChanged 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>其中下列的屬性變更傳回的物件:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果其中一個屬性會設定為不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>，不過對應*PropertyName* `Changed`就會發生事件，但不是會發生 CellStyleContentChanged 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: 資料列、 資料行和資料格屬性的名稱*PropertyName* `Changed`事件開頭"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*> property value changes for a cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>中的資料格的屬性值變更<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要儲存格的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件只發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件時，會顯示您指定的處理常式中的工具提示文字每當滑鼠指標位於儲存格和控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>屬性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件時，您想要顯示由目前的狀態或儲存格的值決定的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當滑鼠指標進入儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理 CellToolTipTextNeeded 事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多個資料格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
