trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格完成驗證之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可用來驗證後置處理的資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格失去輸入的焦點、 啟用內容驗證。

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取消這個事件會取消目前儲存格的變更。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在資料繫結模式取消時，新的值不會發送到基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 當此事件會在虛擬模式中，取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>不會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>事件來執行驗證後置處理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The CellValueChanged event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: 認可，使用者指定的值時，就會發生 CellValueChanged 事件這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格。

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在核取方塊儲存格，不過，您通常要立即處理此變更。

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在按下儲存格時，請認可變更，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 資料格的值變更時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a CellValueChanged event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要在使用者修改資料格時，排序控制項，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>CellValueChanged 事件處理常式中的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>需要才能格式化並顯示資料格的儲存格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 填入使用自訂資料存放區資料的資料格，而不會造成資料列變成非共用的虛擬模式中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將使用者指定的值加入至您的自訂資料存放區中，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和儲存格的值已變更，且需要基礎資料來源中的儲存體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者指定的資料更新的自訂資料存放區中的虛擬模式使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件，以擷取控制項中顯示的資料存放區中的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取所有選取的資料格來清除目前選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，每個資料行和資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取消以外，並選擇性地確定指示的儲存格已選取所有目前選取的儲存格的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: A`rowIndexException`值為-1 表示資料行標頭，和`columnIndexException`值為-1 表示資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，但不取消選取的資料格、 資料列或例外狀況索引所指示的資料行中清除目前選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，可讓個別儲存格選取範圍，這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>的每個資料格屬性`false`，排除資料列和資料行指定的儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，可讓完整的資料列或資料行選取項目，這個方法也集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>每個資料列或資料行的屬性`false`、 不含資料列或資料行，內含指定的儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 排除的資料格、 資料列或資料行可能會或可能未處於選取狀態時呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會選取它如果`selectExceptionElement`參數值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: 根據選取模式，整個資料列或資料行可能也會選取結果。

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要選取排除的資料格、 資料列或資料行;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>保留其原始狀態。

trans-unit.source: columnIndexException is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexException大於最高的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: -or- columnIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, columnIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: -columnIndexException小於-1 時，才能是 ，否則columnIndexException小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: -或-rowIndexException大於最高的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, rowIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: -rowIndexException小於-1 時，才能是 ，否則rowIndexException小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以將複製到儲存格文字值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>以及是否會包含資料列和資料行標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將每個選取的資料格的文字表示法複製到剪貼簿。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是資料格的值轉換成字串或影像資料格的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: 值會複製到剪貼簿<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些格式是用於將內容貼到 [記事本] 之類的應用程式[!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項複製包含所有選取的儲存格的最小矩形中包含的資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 資料列和資料行不包含任何選取的資料格不會出現在複製的資料中。

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的資料列和資料行中任何未選取資料格會以空白預留位置表示。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: 根據複製模式和選取模式，複製的資料列和資料行的標頭值可能會複製，以及。

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者複製內容，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>到剪貼簿。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料物件會從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要以程式設計方式將資料物件加入至剪貼簿時，您可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法會擷取個別資料格的值，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫或這兩種方法，若要自訂複製的儲存格的版面配置，或以支援其他資料格式的衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需剪貼簿 作業和資料格式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 資料行加入至控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip*> property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip*>屬性資料行變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在資料行數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ColumnCount property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 將欄數 屬性設定為 0 會從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>移除所有資料行

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果值小於目前的值來重設欄數，則會從結尾移除資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄數設定的值大於目前的值，將會加入資料行的結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性來建立簡單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顯示和編輯文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在顯示的資料行數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>屬性已設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName*>屬性資料行變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>屬性資料行變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性資料行設定為新的值，或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>資料行屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下兩個資料行之間的分割線。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料行分割線的自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以處理這個事件來以程式設計方式調整大小資料行只會根據目前可見的資料列中的內容使用大量的資料列時，避免使用預設行為對效能產生影響。

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的寬度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，也會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料行行首所套用的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 屬性會設定為任何項目以外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>屬性是`true`，資料行標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會忽略以外的所有資料行標頭 ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 屬性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，主題不套用到。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設資料行標頭樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>有以下的初始屬性值: |`DataGridViewCellStyle`屬性 |預設值 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制繼承的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>值，您必須設定為預設值，指出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle 物件中的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>的資料行標頭

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>設`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>會使用目前的佈景主題，並會忽略值 ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle 繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>表示預設資料行標頭樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the column headers row
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定高度，單位為像素資料的標頭資料列

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row that contains the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （以像素的包含資料行標頭的資料列）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 23.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 23。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum height of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum height of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於最小高度 4 像素，或大於最大高度 32768 像素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可調整資料行行首的高度，而且它可以由使用者進行調整，或自動調整以配合標頭內容。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>，使用者不能調整資料行行首的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行行首的高度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>方法或一組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭的大小調整模式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>屬性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需標頭的調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不支援雙重緩衝。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>設`true`中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會收到的視覺化回饋。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref>值，指出資料行的標頭資料列的高度可調整的模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in the control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試將格式化的使用者指定的值轉換為基礎的資料格的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: To do this, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，便會產生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，您可以處理自訂型別轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, default type converters are used.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會使用預設的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result in an exception if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event is not handled to prevent it.
trans-unit.target: 如果例外狀況造成轉換錯誤的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件不會處理以防止它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event for non-data-bound cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功轉換的值，便被認可至資料存放區引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>非資料繫結的事件資料格時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully committed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為成功認可，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref>值，指定的內容可以發生的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changes were committed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已認可; 變更否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 無法認可資料格的值，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
