trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的現用儲存格。

trans-unit.source: When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當您將儲存格設定為目前的儲存格時，它會捲動到檢視如果目前沒有顯示。

trans-unit.source: The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏的資料列或資料行不可標頭資料格、 已停用的資料格或儲存格的目前儲存格。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性設定為`null`暫時移除焦點矩形，但是當控制項取得焦點，而且這個屬性的值是`null`，它會自動設定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更這個屬性的值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>之前就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event handler accessing the CurrentCell property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>存取 CurrentCell 屬性在這個階段的事件處理常式，會在先前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 當您繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到外部資料來源，這個屬性會重設為其預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that represents the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，代表目前的儲存格，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有目前的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The default is the first cell in the first column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是第一個資料行中的第一個儲存格或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果在控制項中沒有任何儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because changes to the current cell cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的值，因為無法認可或取消目前儲存格的變更。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified cell when setting this property is in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: -或者-指定的儲存格時設定這個屬性是隱藏的資料列或資料行中。

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling is only allowed when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 可重新進入的呼叫時，才允許<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling results from a change to the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 可重新進入呼叫的結果變更基礎資料。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，指定儲存格不在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的現用儲存格的資料列和資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷資料列和資料行的目前儲存格，而不需要直接存取儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，以避免資料列取消共用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，代表目前的現用儲存格的資料列和資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格狀態變更是與內容變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved.
trans-unit.target: 資料格被標示為已修改，如果其內容已變更，但變更尚未儲存。

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已編輯資料格，但是變更尚未認可的資料快取，或取消編輯作業時，通常就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row containing the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含目前儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To change the current row, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to a cell in the desired row.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更目前的資料列，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>所需的資料列中的資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that represents the row containing the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>表示包含目前資料格的資料列或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有目前的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a data-binding operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結作業完成之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 或內容的資料來源變更時，會引發這個事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates.
trans-unit.target: 處理這個事件非常有用，例如，若要以程式設計方式調整大小資料列和資料行的內容更新為基礎。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.
trans-unit.target: 發生於外部資料剖析或驗證作業擲回例外狀況，或是當嘗試認可至資料來源的資料就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The DataError event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations.
trans-unit.target: DataError 事件可讓您處理資料處理作業期間會呼叫控制項的程式碼中擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs>通常與此事件相關聯的物件表示儲存格所在資料時發生錯誤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤時在外部資料來源，不過，資料來源可能不會提供發生錯誤的資料行。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>屬性通常表示在發生錯誤時的目前儲存格的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list or table in the data source for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源中的清單或資料表的名稱，其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>會顯示資料。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表時，這個屬性是很有用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要繫結至包含單一清單或資料表的資料來源時，設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains a single table without setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，包含單一資料表，但未設定這個屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含多個資料表，不過，您必須設定此屬性的其中一個資料表名稱。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The name of the table or list in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: 資料表或清單中的名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>會顯示資料。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中發生錯誤，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>已設定事件或處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生當值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>中顯示資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別支援標準的 Windows Form 資料繫結模型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - The <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface, including one-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: 這表示資料來源可以是任何類型的實作下列介面的其中一個:-<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面，包括一維陣列。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, such as the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataSet> classes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面，例如<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>類別。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> class.
trans-unit.target: -此<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>介面，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: -此<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>介面，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section.
trans-unit.target: 如需特定範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節和工作表的這個區段結尾。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will bind to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component and bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to another data source or populate it with business objects.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您會繫結，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件，並繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件至另一個資料來源，或使用商務物件填入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件是慣用的資料來源，因為它可以繫結至各種資料來源，並自動解決許多資料繫結問題。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>屬性設為指定之清單或繫結至資料表的字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component instead.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件包含多個清單或資料表，不過，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` rather than using the default value of <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, which is appropriate for database data.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結的物件集合，而不資料庫資料，您通常會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性`null`而不是使用預設值的<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>，這是適用於資料庫資料。</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中顯示的資料](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the DataSource property.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供直接連結到資料來源屬性相關的一般工作。

trans-unit.source: See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立主從式表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[How to︰ 將物件繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含資料<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>顯示。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中發生錯誤，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>已設定事件或處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> if no other cell style properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用到中的資料格的預設儲存格樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>如果不設定任何其他儲存格樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其儲存格，使用以資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，後者繼承自其他屬性的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>樣式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的樣式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: DefaultCellStyle 屬性透過指定的樣式會影響所有的資料格，除了時覆寫下列屬性透過指定的樣式:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 您應該盡可能使用單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>設定此屬性的多個資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>来套用為預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property are set to new values or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性都設為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default initial size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設初始大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the initial size of the control, which is 240 pixels wide by 150 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>代表控制項，也就是 240 像素寬 x 150 像素高的初始大小。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者資料列中輸入新記錄以便填入預設值。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您填入新的記錄的資料列，當使用者輸入的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Initial values for the row come from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> returned by each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始資料列的值來自於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>每個資料行所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料繫結模式中，所有資料格的資料繫結資料行儲存在外部資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the DefaultValuesNeeded event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入新記錄的資料列時，在特定 DefaultValuesNeeded 事件發生之前沒有資料來源中建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當您擴展<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性在事件處理常式中，這些值會加入至資料來源直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store.
trans-unit.target: 在虛擬模式中之後就會發生此事件，,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>就會發生事件的新資料列中的每個資料格，讓您可以在您的自訂資料存放區中儲存的預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event, which are then displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>中新的資料列，每一個資料格就會發生事件擷取的值儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，然後顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回顯示給使用者的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial columns in the displayed column count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>加入部分資料行中顯示的資料行計數。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回顯示給使用者的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial rows in the displayed row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>加入部分資料列中顯示的資料列計數。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示控制項顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayRectangle property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.
trans-unit.target: DisplayRectangle 屬性傳回的用戶端矩形的顯示區域的控制項，不包含會顯示任何捲軸的區域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表控制項的顯示區域。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>以及它的子系控制項，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有編輯控制項的儲存格處於編輯模式，請取得目前的儲存格所裝載的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不是處於編輯模式，或資料格類型並不支援編輯控制項，這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by the current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>目前儲存格所裝載。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: 顯示編輯儲存格的控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To perform other initialization, cast the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the specific control type and access the members directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行其他初始化，將值轉型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為特定控制項類型，並直接存取的成員。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the EditingControlShowing event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以處理 EditingControlShowing 事件，若要將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項裝載一個編輯控制項一次，並重複使用的編輯控制項，只要編輯之間不會變更資料格類型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 時將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項，因此您必須採取預防措施，以避免將相同的處理常式附加多次。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請從前您附加至事件的處理常式的事件中移除處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 這將避免重複，如果此處理常式已附加至事件，但否則沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>類別概觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the panel that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>的面板

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property, which is `null` when the current cell is not in edit mode, the EditingPanel property is always available.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>屬性，這是`null`目前儲存格不是處於編輯模式，EditingPanel 屬性可用時，一律。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to begin editing a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要如何開始編輯儲存格。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> also allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: 所有的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>也可讓使用者按兩下儲存格開始編輯它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但無法編輯儲存格值的初始沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式啟用視覺化樣式，則資料列和資料行行首是否使用使用者的目前佈景主題的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為您的應用程式啟用視覺化樣式，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法之前先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If EnableHeadersVisualStyles is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 EnableHeadersVisualStyles `true`，以外的所有標頭資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if visual styles are enabled for the headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用視覺化樣式的標頭。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the default error context.
trans-unit.target: 認可及結束使用預設錯誤內容的目前儲存格上的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A> overload, passing in a bitwise combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> values.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格是在第一個資料列和目前顯示在控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是在左上角，但它是由右至左語言的右上角。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定這個屬性，以將控制項捲動至指示的儲存格。

trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，指定儲存格<> *> 或<> *> 屬性值為-1，表示它標題儲存格或共用的資料格。

trans-unit.target: 取得目前捲動到檢視的資料行部分的寬度...

trans-unit.target: 捲動到檢視的資料行部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示之文字的字型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Drawing.Font>是不可變的 （表示您不能調整的任何屬性），您只能指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>新屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the Font property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項使用的字型屬性值的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Font value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: 變更字型值會自動更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>內容，變更任何繼承值的資料格的字型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，標頭資料格覆寫的值，您可以覆寫特定資料列、 資料行和資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取選取的資料格數目，例如，使用此方法時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這是通常更有效率使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>指定要計數儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the includeFilter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 比對的資料格數目 includeFilter 參數。

trans-unit.source: includeFilter includes the value .
trans-unit.target: includeFilter包含值 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示儲存格的顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回整個儲存格界限或只顯示的部分。

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得儲存格界限內容，使用資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需的儲存格的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需的儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要傳回的儲存格; 的顯示的部分<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示傳回整個儲存格界限。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取代表的內容複製到選取的資料格的格式化的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取表示所選取的資料格定義的區域資料。

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此區域是最小的矩形，其中包含所有選取的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此區域中的每個所選資料格的值藉由呼叫擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: 未選取的資料格，在此區域中，會使用空白預留位置值。

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會結合這些值插入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含數種格式來複製到剪貼簿。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 支援剪貼簿格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"> </xref>表示選取的資料格的內容。

trans-unit.target: 傳回代表由資料行索引所決定的資料行的顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定區隔的儲存格的格線色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the GridColor property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用單一的框線; 時，您可以為任何色彩設定 GridColor 屬性與其他類型的框線，作業系統所指定的色彩。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the GridColor property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法時，忽略 GridColor 屬性，而使用的目前佈景主題色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> or <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"> </xref> ，代表格線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property has a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: -或-指定的值設定這個屬性時具有<xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值小於 255。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位置資訊，例如資料列和資料行的索引、 給定 x 和 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一個部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項位於指定座標。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以呼叫這個方法 — 指定點選滑鼠座標︰ 判斷按下儲存格，或是否已按下標頭資料格或捲動列的資料列和資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: X 軸座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo> that contains the location information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>，其中包含位置資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的儲存格是否有未認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>未繫結至資料的儲存格的編輯會被視為認可，當使用者移到另一個資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列標頭可見，鉛筆字符的會顯示標頭中包含未認可的變更儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: If IsCurrentCellDirty is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 IsCurrentCellDirty`true`和目前的儲存格裝載編輯控制項，您可以透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前儲存格有未經認可的變更。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently active cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否正在編輯目前的現用儲存格。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that has focus is always in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，焦點一直處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If the current cell hosts an editing control and IsCurrentCellInEditMode is `true`, you can retrieve the editing control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前儲存格裝載編輯控制項，而且是 IsCurrentCellInEditMode `true`，您可以擷取透過編輯控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果正在編輯目前的儲存格;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的資料列是否有未認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`true`鉛筆圖像 （glyph） 的資料列中顯示時。

trans-unit.source: By default, the IsCurrentRowDirty property will always equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，IsCurrentRowDirty 屬性會一律等於值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>屬性，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>繫結至資料來源的已實作支援編輯或虛擬模式使用資料列層級認可範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will evaluate this property at the row level.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>將評估此資料列層級的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者導覽離開該資料列中時，控制項就會認可所有資料列變更。

trans-unit.source: The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row.
trans-unit.target: 使用者也可以按 CTRL + ENTER 認可資料列變更，而不需離開資料列。

trans-unit.source: To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式認可的資料列變更，呼叫表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your data source is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, you can also call<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的資料來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，您也可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前資料列有未認可的變更。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字元是否為輸入字元<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>辨識。

trans-unit.source: A character is recognized as an input character depending on whether the control is in edit mode and whether the current editing control can accept the character.
trans-unit.target: 字元辨識為根據控制項是否處於編輯模式，以及目前的編輯控制項是否可以接受字元的輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is recognized as an input character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元辨識為輸入字元。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the column and row with the specified indexes.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引子以取得或設定位於具有指定索引的資料列與資料行二者交集處的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引子是可存取的儲存格至替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex小於 0 或大於減 1 控制項中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: -或-rowIndex小於 0 或大於此數目減 1 控制項中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the row with the specified index and the column with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引子以取得或設定位於具有指定之索引資料列以及具有指定名稱的資料行二者交集處的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引子是可存取的儲存格至替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> at a time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許使用者選取多個資料格、 資料列或資料行<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>一次。

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 當多重選取的屬性設定為`true`，多個項目 （儲存格、 資料列或資料行） 中可選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取多個項目，使用者可以按住 CTRL 鍵，同時按一下選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select.
trans-unit.target: 按一下以選取的第一個項目，然後按住 SHIFT 鍵，按一下以選取的最後一個項目時，可以選取連續的項目。

trans-unit.source: The selection scope is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 選取範圍根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the user can select multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>，使用者可以選取多個資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the MultiSelect property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and perform an operation on all the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用多重選取的屬性，以允許使用者選取多個項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，以及所有選取的項目上執行作業。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可以選取多個資料格，然後以滑鼠右鍵按一下選取的儲存格顯示快顯功能表會顯示一組在選取的資料格上執行的工作。

trans-unit.source: To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, you can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪些資料格、 資料列或資料行中所選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，您可以存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of selected cells, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷選取的資料格數目，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>與引數值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>方法來擷取選取的資料列的數目和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A>方法來擷取資料行數目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會比直接存取集合，使用大量的資料時更有效率。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以選取多個資料格、 資料列或資料行一次。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 取得新記錄的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`false`，這個屬性的值等於資料列數目減 1 控制項中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row for new records, or -1 if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的記錄，或是-1 的資料列的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>且使用者巡覽至新的資料列底部<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虛擬模式中，此事件可讓新的資料列的資料存放區中建立新的項目，而且它也允許填入預設值的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>目前儲存格有未經認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Typically, double-clicking a cell puts the cell in edit mode.

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會認可儲存格值或進入編輯模式，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個動作，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged"></xref> event and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*> property if the cursor was changed in user code.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged"></xref>事件，並更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>屬性在使用者程式碼中變更游標，則如果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property value depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>根據滑鼠指標位置的屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property stores the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property and ignores the control's changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>屬性儲存的一般值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>屬性，並忽略控制項的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged> event occurs, and it updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property, if necessary, in addition to invoking any event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>事件開始進行，而且它會更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>屬性，如有必要，除了叫用任何事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Binding operations occur when the data changes while a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is in use.
trans-unit.target: 在資料變更時，就會發生繫結作業而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>正在使用中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will update its view and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>事件發生時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>將會更新它的檢視，然後引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>事件完成後。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
