trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but upon entering focus, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項設定焦點時，但在進入焦點時進入編輯模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>屬性的目前儲存格不會指出衍生自類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>並實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項進入編輯模式時取得焦點，但無法編輯儲存格值的初始沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event, this method uses the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>properties.
trans-unit.target: 除了引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件，這個方法會使用的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>要更新屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that occur during this method are ignored unless they are one of the following: - <xref:System.NullReferenceException> - <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"></xref> - <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> - <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref> - <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> - <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> - <xref href="System.AccessViolationException"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 這個方法期間發生任何例外狀況會被忽略，除非它們是下列其中之一:- <xref:System.NullReferenceException>- <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"> </xref> - <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>- <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"> </xref> - <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"> </xref> - <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException>- <xref href="System.AccessViolationException"> </xref> </xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> </xref:System.NullReferenceException>

trans-unit.source: The OnUserDeletedRow method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnUserDeletedRow 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event, this method ends the current cell edit and validates the cell and row values.
trans-unit.target: 除了引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>事件，這個方法會結束目前儲存格的編輯，並驗證的儲存格和資料列的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: OnValidating 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: Validation failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性對這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性對這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A> property is not relevant for this control, although you can change its value and respond to such changes by handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>屬性無關對這個控制項，雖然您可以變更其值，並藉由處理這個事件回應這類變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 繪製背景的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: `clipBounds`參數代表的區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，需要重新繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>與另一個視窗，然後發現，`clipBounds`代表整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，然後發現，`clipBounds`表示所涵蓋的範圍縮小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用來繪製背景。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>所代表的區域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ，當需要繪製。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area in which cells are drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示描繪儲存格的區域。

trans-unit.source: Processes the A key.
trans-unit.target: 處理 A 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses CTRL+A and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`當使用者按下 CTRL + A 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, this selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這會選取所有儲存格控制項中。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的索引鍵否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys used for navigating in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 處理使用中巡覽的按鍵<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A> method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫金鑰處理方法適用於按鍵 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>方法在按下 F2 時)，並傳回該方法的傳回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 包含已按下按鍵相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的索引鍵否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>屬性的目前儲存格不會指出衍生自類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>並實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會認可儲存格值或進入編輯模式，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個動作，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-刪除索引鍵會刪除一或多個資料列，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個刪除，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 處理 DELETE 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses DELETE to delete rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`當使用者按下刪除 以刪除控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The user can delete rows if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以刪除資料列，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the data source must also be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>繫結至資料，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資料來源的屬性，也必須設定為`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的索引鍵否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes keys, such as the TAB, ESCAPE, ENTER, and ARROW keys, used to control dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 處理按鍵，例如 索引標籤、 ESCAPE、 ENTER 和箭號，用來控制對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: This method is called in edit mode to handle keyboard input that is not handled by the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法是在編輯模式，來處理不由裝載之編輯控制項的鍵盤輸入。

trans-unit.source: If a key press is determined to not be an input key, it will be sent to the base class for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下按鍵會判定為不是輸入的按鍵，便會傳送要處理的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The TAB key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the new current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: TAB 鍵會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>新的目前儲存格的屬性不會指出衍生自類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>並實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會認可儲存格值或進入編輯模式，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個動作，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the UP ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: 處理向上鍵。

trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The UP ARROW key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the new current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 向上鍵會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>新的目前儲存格的屬性不會指出衍生自類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>並實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The 0 key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 0 鍵會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>屬性的目前儲存格不會指出衍生自類別<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>並實作<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此動作可能會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個動作，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以編輯的儲存格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the ReadOnly property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 資料格是唯讀的 ReadOnly 屬性的值是否`true`資料格、 資料格的資料列、 資料格的資料行，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者不能編輯的儲存格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>、 目前的儲存格處於編輯模式，和目前的儲存格包含無法認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但無法編輯儲存格值的初始沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件或處理常式已設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格處於編輯模式，並捨棄先前的任何值時，請重新整理目前儲存格的值與基礎資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，以強制更新處於編輯模式下顯示值的資料格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: 當外部處理序會修改儲存格的值，而且您想要通知使用者變更，即使使用者指定的變更將會遺失如此一來，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果登錄成功。，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>屬性為其預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為如所述，雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>屬性對這個控制項無關。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要資料列的捷徑功能表時。

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件只發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件時，您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或包含的值。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件時，會顯示您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表每當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理 RowContextMenuStripNeeded 事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料列的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在資料列數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列計數設為小於目前的值，將會移除資料列從結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列計數設定為大於目前的值，資料列就會加入至結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料列會根據中指定的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的資料列計數屬性設為 0 時，會從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>移除所有資料列

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set RowCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`，您無法將資料列計數設定為 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來移除新記錄的資料列以外的所有資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting RowCount to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>有相同的結果與在此情況下，將資料列計數設定為 1，但是會更快。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RowCount property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: 可以搭配使用的資料列計數屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>屬性來建立簡單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顯示和編輯文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將設定 RowCount 屬性值大於 0。<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>不使用資料行，控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>會自動加入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在中顯示的資料列數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value is less than 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-指定的值是小於 1 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>設<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>資料列變更的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性或資料列設定為新值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>的資料列的屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>需要判斷目前的資料列是否有未認可的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此事件設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`如果已修改目前的資料列中的任何資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>事件發生時使用者會還原到資料列的編輯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以編輯內容還原到一個資料列兩次時儲存格處於編輯模式，或一次編輯模式之外，請按下 esc 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用來設定自訂的虛擬模式中的認可範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設為正確的值，視所選擇的認可範圍而定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下兩個資料列之間的分隔線。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料列分割線的自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的高度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The divider height is modified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定修改的分割線的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列收到輸入的焦點，但尚未變成目前的資料列之前。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: 就會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>一開始載入時，以及當使用者選取目前的資料列以外的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>更新屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property within the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取新輸入資料列的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>內的事件處理常式屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*> property of a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>的資料列變更的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要資料列的錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: RowErrorTextNeeded 事件只發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件時，您想要判斷視其狀態和它所包含的值而定的資料列的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件處理常式中指定錯誤文字時，錯誤圖像便會出現在資料列標頭，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: RowErrorTextNeeded 事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理 RowErrorTextNeeded 事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>多個資料列的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者變更的資料列標題儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下資料列行首的界限內時發生。

trans-unit.target: 按兩下資料列行首時發生。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列標題儲存格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RowHeadersBorderStyle 屬性會設定為任何項目以外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>屬性是`true`，資料列標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all row headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所有資料列以外的標頭則會忽略 RowHeadersBorderStyle 屬性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，主題不套用到。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至資料列標題儲存格的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: |DataGridViewCellStyle property|Default value| |------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |DataGridViewCellStyle 屬性 |預設值 | |------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>屬性的值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>|
